## Report on COVID Cases and Deaths

From January 21, 2020 to October 31, 2022, there were a total of 97,258,022 
COVID cases in the United States. There were 1,066,235 COVID-related deaths in 
that time. 

**Here is a chart depicting the US Covid Cases**
